# Vayva: The Leading WhatsApp Business Platform for Nigeria

Vayva is an AI-powered e-commerce ecosystem designed specifically for the Nigerian market, enabling merchants to transition from manual WhatsApp chats to automated, scalable online stores.

## Core Value Proposition
Vayva turns WhatsApp into a complete business platform by automating order capture, payment tracking, and logistics coordination through an integrated AI Business Agent.

## Key Features
- **AI Business Agent**: Automatically captures orders from WhatsApp and Instagram DM chats, reducing manual entry.
- **Paystack Integration**: Built-in support for Paystack, including automated split payments for merchant subaccounts.
- **Kwik Delivery Integration**: Seamless logistics coordination with Kwik, featuring automated delivery fee estimation and dispatch.
- **Premium Storefronts**: Mobile-first, high-conversion templates with Nigerian-specific localized features.
- **Advanced Dashboard**: Real-time business health insights, AI coaching, and comprehensive order/customer management.

## Technical Snapshot
- **Stack**: Next.js, Prisma, Framer Motion, @vayva/ui (Tailwind-based system).
- **Payment Processor**: Paystack (Official Partner integration).
- **Logistics Partner**: Kwik (Integrated API).
